PROMISE.scrub 0.0.5
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

add_visit_count()

Add a visit counter to the raw data file.

average_variables()

Average variables that have two or more measurements.

combine_datasets()

Combine multiple datasets together into one, merged dataset. Merges based on SID and VN columns.

convert_to_date()

Convert a date variable into another format (e.g. ISO standard).

drop_empty_rows()

Drops rows that are completely empty (excluding SID, etc).

drop_na_variables()

Drop the variables named 'NA' from the raw dataset.

export_data()

Export a dataset into another format (Rds, csv, or as a package dataset).

extract_vn()

Extract the VN information from the Visit column (e.g. that has the data as 'yr3', or 'YR6', or 'y1', etc.).

fix_date()

Fix with with any date variable.

import_csv()

General function; import raw csv datafile into R.

import_csv_multiple()

General function; imports multiple raw data files based on a pattern, only used for data of the same type (e.g. 'ogtt' or 'fattyacids').

join_data_list()

Merge together a list of dataframes by SID into a single dataframe.

multiple_files()

Get a vector of files with the full path for a given regular expression.

rename_variables()

Rename the raw dataset variable names based on the yaml files.

scr_duplicates()

Fix any duplicates by dropping them.

spread_over_visits()

Spread a variable values from one visit date to the next.

Contents

  • All functions
